bibl.title: Packing list of a Katholikos
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, IV CE. List organized according to the containers which held articles of clothing, often luxury items. Latin terms and diminutive forms are prominent features in the text.
bibl.seg: Philip F. Venticinque, Packing List of a Katholikos.
